content: In what 1994 film does Tom Hanks play the title character, who tells his life story while waiting at a bus stop?

The 1994 film you're referring to is "Forrest Gump." In this movie, Tom Hanks plays the titular character, Forrest Gump, who narrates his life story while waiting at a bus stop. The film is known for its humorous and heartwarming portrayal of a man with a low IQ who unwittingly becomes involved in many historical events in the United States over several decades.
